local_intro.paragraph: From the bustling businesses in the Short North Arts District to the growing companies in Easton Town Center and the Polaris business corridor, Columbus small business owners face a common challenge: missed calls mean missed opportunities. Whether you're running an HVAC company in Dublin, a law practice near the Ohio Statehouse, or a home services business in Westerville, every unanswered call could be a lost customer. That's where Capture Client's Voice AI technology comes in.

benefits.title: 24/7 Availability for Columbus Customers
benefits.description: Your Columbus customers call at all hours. Our AI voice agents never sleep, ensuring every call from Franklin County is answered professionally.

benefits.title: Instant Lead Qualification
benefits.description: Stop wasting time on unqualified leads. Our AI asks the right questions upfront so you only talk to serious Columbus prospects ready to buy.

benefits.title: Automatic Appointment Scheduling
benefits.description: Let AI book appointments directly into your calendar. No more phone tag with Columbus customers.

benefits.title: Cost Savings Over Traditional Staff
benefits.description: Hiring a receptionist in Columbus costs $30,000-$40,000/year. Our Voice AI costs a fraction of that.

faq.question: How does Voice AI work for Columbus businesses?
faq.answer: Our Voice AI answers professionally, asks qualifying questions, provides information, schedules appointments, and transfers urgent calls. It works 24/7 for Columbus customers.

faq.question: What Columbus businesses benefit most?
faq.answer: HVAC, plumbers, electricians, law firms, medical practices, real estate agents, contractors in Columbus all benefit from Voice AI automation.

faq.question: Does the AI sound robotic?
faq.answer: Not at all! Most Columbus callers don't realize they're talking to AI. We customize voice and tone to match your brand.

faq.question: How quickly can you set up for my Columbus business?
faq.answer: Most Columbus businesses are running within 1-2 weeks from initial strategy call to launch.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my CRM?
faq.answer: Yes! Integrates with HubSpot, Salesforce, ServiceTitan, Jobber and tools used by Columbus businesses.
